definition[0]: a person, business etc that is having problems and needs help
definition[1]: a politician or a government that no longer has any real power or authority
example[0]: A bad defeat for his party in October risks making him a lame duck for the remaining two years of his presidency.
definition[2]: a company that is losing a lot of money
example[1]: We don’t have time to fix broken companies and we won’t be buying any lame ducks.
